PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08562021-08-10,  ,  ,  ,  PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the designation by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of CAROLINE DROMAGUET of Ottawa, Ontario, to act as Director of the Canadian Museum of History, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year or until such time as a new Director is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective December 11, 2021.
AttachmentsAttachment
